website_summaries.verdict: These slip-on sneakers are sure to impress little and big kids alike.
pros: Sneaker bottoms equipped with anti-slip rubber to reduce the risk of falls
Wedge-shaped cushioning ensures the sneakers are comfortable and supportive
Sold in a variety of sizes
Offer superior quality in comparison to similar options
cons: Sneakers tend to run small and may be too narrow for some children

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am a thirty-something year old woman who has to buy "little kids" size 2.5 shoes. So needless to say, shoe shopping is a bit tough for me. I bought these for everyday walking, errands, etc. These are hands down one of the most comfortable pairs of shoes I have ever owned. Light weight, I feel like I'm walking on air. I will buy these is another color, just to have another pair as a back up!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Pavlovich

customer_reviews.title: Check sizing. Not for high arches.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the navy blue / purple Go Walk 4. Looks just like the photos. We had to return these as they were too smal for my daughter. Sketchers sizing is never consistent. For reference, we ordered a size 2 and the bottom of the shoe measures 9.5” long and 3 5/8” at widest. My daughter has average width feet but high arches. These ran just a bit narrow. Also not good for kids with high arches or that need inserts as the heel isn’t deep.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: fit varies with color/fabric
customer_reviews.text: The multi-colored shoes are made of a more flexible fabric than the gray shoes, which ended up being a bit too tight for my daughter (size 4 big kid). My daughter finds the multi-colored shoes really comfy but the gray ones were too tight and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Skid proof and nice support.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mother who wears small sizes. She loves them. Skid proof and nice support.
customer_reviews.author: Hike Girl

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were so cute, but way too narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were so cute, but way too narrow. My daughters both wear a 12.5 or 13 in all other shoes. We ordered these in a 13 and they could barely squeeze their feet into it. It was so tight across the top and not the quick slip on shoes I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: AMom

customer_reviews.title: Best kids shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Kids grow so fast that buying good shoes at a good price is a challenge, especially on my budget. These have solved the problem with flying colours! My daughter has happy feet in shoes she is proud to show off. No matter if it's a field trip, gym class, or running around with the dogs she has never had a blister or tired, sore feet. Best kids shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes that we got her for this school year! Lightweight, cool and comfy. They will look cute with dresses and shorts too but be ok for PE days!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: What cute shoes! My 5 year old goes straight to these shoes over all the others. She just slips into them, she can run around wild without them coming off, and they go good with all kinds of outfits. Looked cute with a casual dress too!
customer_reviews.author: T-Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. They fit her perfectly and are very comfortable. These are also acceptable to wear to school with her uniform which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Fashionista80

customer_reviews.title: I wish the make more patterns and color
customer_reviews.text: I am a Skechers fan and buy Skechers kids as women sizes are too big for me. I wish sketchers take a note that lot of adults buy kids sizes so kids sizes need to be more comfy with features as good as adult patterns.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: didnt fit
customer_reviews.text: great looking shoe but sooo narrow. My daughter has shoes smaller than these and they fit ok - but couldn't get her foot in these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes!!! She says they are so comfy. She is age five. They are constructed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Mills

customer_reviews.title: its a yes
customer_reviews.text: she loves these, calls them her comfy shoes!! that means a lot, I like the hole in the heel to help you pull them on
customer_reviews.author: S. White

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes - wear out quickly.
customer_reviews.text: We love these, but my kid put holes in the top of the toes within 60 days. The fabric is pretty delicate. Still - bought another pair in another color. Wish the price reflected the need to replace them every 60 days!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Except for being to tight around the toes, my ...
customer_reviews.text: Except for being to tight around the toes, my daughter loves this shoe! We will be getting the bigger pair!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2-3 sizes too small
customer_reviews.text: Super cute out of the box, but does not fit like in-store shoe I've bought in a different color. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: DEANNA KENNEDY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves slip on shoes so these were perfect. Its her second pair of Sketchers slip on's.
customer_reviews.author: all4lyn

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Used them for Disney 3 days, lots of walking! Get the shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe! Great quality! My daughter wore it for 2 years, till her foot couldn't fit in anymore, but she loved it & couldn't stop wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: Chanie H

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved skechers for their quality
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved skechers for their quality. I love the soft and comfortable feel of the soles. The only problem was the fit, it was somewhat larger. My feet are small and lean :( cant blame the product :P
customer_reviews.author: Shruti

customer_reviews.title: perfect for 2nd grade play
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves slipping on these comfy shoes! perfect for 2nd grade play!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves this style but don’t hold up well to wear. Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Nana23a

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are good for walking but really don't hold up anywhere else (dirt / rocks / etc)
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my granddaughter several pairs of slip on sneakers and none either were comfortable or fit correctly. These fit her wonderfully and she absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle L. Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Could not find any to fit a wide foot comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: Apparently Skechers Kids Girls' shoes only come in medium or narrow. Could not find any to fit a wide foot comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia B. R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mc_N

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these. Only shoes she wants to wear lately. Must be very comfy. Are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bailey

customer_reviews.title: and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly, are extraordinarily light, and easy to wash. The colour is perfect to hide the dirt, too!
customer_reviews.author: CaymanMum

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: photo takin' mom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for kids (and adults
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for kids (and adults!) Confortable, lightweight and easy to slip on. The kids are on their 3rd pair. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and easy on the feet. My daughter loves these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Harlendd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: My child says the shoes are very comfortable and best of all can be slipped on instead of tied.
customer_reviews.author: myOldHouse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and easy to put on. We use foot powder to help keep it smelling nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nabia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoes for my 7-year old daughter. She loves it! She said really comfortable and very easy to put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Imuziok6010

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself & I loves them and they fit well. They are a great shoes you can slip on quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Frodsham

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cool
customer_reviews.text: A comfortable, stylish and versatile shoe. My daughter wears these with her school uniform. They are great for climbing and running on the playground. Lightweight and easy to slip on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Cope

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked that they are all black. Not as easy to get on as some of the others I have.
customer_reviews.author: suernow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute and great quality. My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Layla Lou

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for school or play
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old LOVES these shoes! They are perfect for school or play!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: My girls love it
customer_reviews.text: It's her third pair. I cannot find it in sketcher's store but amazon got it at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on, easy off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 9 year old Grandgirl. She loves them. These fit true to size. Easy on, easy off. Perfect for summer wear that requires more than a sandal or flip flop.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light weight just like picture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light weight just like picture ! Only con is I had to stretch them out for my daughter they have a snug fit definetly not for wide/chunky feet.....
customer_reviews.author: aundria

customer_reviews.title: Very good fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: My daughter like this shoe than anyother she has. Fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pillows
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. She calls them her pillow shoes, haha.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfertable, cheap and too wide
customer_reviews.text: The Skechers Go Walk Kids were. Uncomfortable, made of cheap materials and wide as boats
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Arthur

customer_reviews.title: my daughter loves these shoe because she can put them ...
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves these shoe because she can put them on by herself. they are very cute and go well with jeans or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Nalley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable and light, I am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryoko M

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look good. Very comfortable to wear with sock
customer_reviews.text: Shoes look good. Very comfortable to wear with sock. Cannot be worn without sock as they hurt the back of the foot and rub hard. and they smell terrible ( feet get smelly). I threw them away after a month of use. Will not buy again nor recommend :-(
customer_reviews.author: KUKUSHKA

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect and is easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter loves the shoe! Fits perfect and is easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughters both like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My daughters both like these shoes. They wear like sneakers, but are quick and easy to put on and off. These are perfect for summer camp, where they must wear closed-toed sneakers (no sandals), but have to changed multiple times per day for swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia D. Volkheimer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for us
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice but too narrow for my daughter's feet. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were a little big, and I wear an adult 7 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: sharon miller

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Correct size but is a squeeze to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Lawther

product_meta.title: Skechers Kids Go Walk 4 Slip-On Sneaker (Little Kid/Big Kid)
feature_bullets: Innovative and highly responsive 5GEN� midsole cushioning
5th Generation design provides a high energy return on every step
Mesh upper engineered to naturally expand with your foot while you walk
Single seamless construction for comfortable fit
